If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
Register-EngineEvent -SourceIdentifier PowerShell.OnIdle -MessageData @{exiresOn=(Get-Date)} -Action {Write-Host 'test message' -verbose}
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

should print `test message` whenever idle (works in PS 5.1)

Actual behavior
---------------

nothing happens
